message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $130. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really benefit from this product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to take a small step back from my previous offer, so I'm counteroffering at $128. It's a fair price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll really appreciate it!
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $128. Would you be willing to meet me at $126?

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to meet you at $126. I'm willing to take a small step back again, so I'm counteroffering at $129. It's a fair price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll really appreciate it!
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $129. Would you be willing to meet me at $127?

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to meet you at $127. I'm willing to take a small step back again, so I'm counteroffering at $131. It's a fair price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll really appreciate it!
